title: ion-spinner
body: The Spinner component provides a variety of animated SVG spinners. Spinners are visual indicators that the app is loading content or performing another process that the user needs to wait on.
The default spinner to use is based on the platform. The default spinner for
property is set, then that spinner will be used instead of the platform specific spinner.

props.name: color
props.docs: The color to use from your application's color palette. Default options are: "primary", "secondary", "tertiary", "success", "warning", "danger", "light", "medium", and "dark". For more information on colors, see theming.

props.name: duration
props.docs: Duration of the spinner animation in milliseconds. The default varies based on the spinner.

props.name: name
props.docs: The name of the SVG spinner to use. If a name is not provided, the platform's default spinner will be used.

props.name: paused
props.docs: If true, the spinner's animation will be paused.

docs:
The Spinner component provides a variety of animated SVG spinners. Spinners are visual indicators that the app is loading content or performing another process that the user needs to wait on.

The default spinner to use is based on the platform. The default spinner for `ios` is `"lines"`, and the default for `android` is `"crescent"`. If the platform is not `ios` or `android`, the spinner will default to `crescent`. If the `name` property is set, then that spinner will be used instead of the platform specific spinner.
